sentences.sContent: People suffering from amnesia don't forget their general knowledge of objects.
sentences.sCn: 患有失忆症的人不会忘记他们对物品的常识。

remMethod.val: a (无) + mnes (记忆) + ia (病) → 无记忆的病 → 健忘症

words.tran: 遗忘的；记忆缺失的（等于amnesiac）

trans.tranCn: 健忘症，[内科] 记忆缺失
trans.tranOther: the medical condition of not being able to remember anything
